Note: Signed "H. Heyer." Date based on the date of the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign.  The text calls for Philadelphia to follow the example of patriotism shown by Philadelphia men such as Franklin, Girard, and Cooke by purchasing Liberty Bonds.   The illustration shows an old women holding a Liberty bond leaning over a seated Ben Franklin.
